thread.title: BRIEF-‍New Jersey Natural Gas To Reduce Customers' Rates By $21 Mln, Effective April 1, 2018

title: BRIEF-‍New Jersey Natural Gas To Reduce Customers' Rates By $21 Mln, Effective April 1, 2018

organizations.name: new jersey natural gas to reduce customers

text:
March 2 (Reuters) - New Jersey Natural Gas :
* ‍NEW JERSEY NATURAL GAS - SUBMITTED FILING TO NEW JERSEY BOARD OF PUBLIC UTILITIES TO PASS THROUGH BENEFITS OF FEDERAL TAX REFORM TO CUSTOMERS​
* NEW JERSEY NATURAL GAS SAYS WILL REDUCE CUSTOMERS’ RATES BY $21 MILLION, EFFECTIVE APRIL 1, 2018
* NEW JERSEY NATURAL GAS - WILL PROVIDE ONE-TIME REFUND TO CUSTOMERS OF ABOUT $31 MILLION; ESTIMATED REFUND FOR TYPICAL RESIDENTIAL HEAT CUSTOMER IS $47​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
